OnCommandMsgs.msg: Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch server mode. [GREEN]!mode prac[NORMAL] works as well. Type [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] for the current mode map list. [GREEN]!map de_inferno[NORMAL] works as well.  To enter [GREEN]prefire practice[NORMAL] mode, please type [RED]!prefire[NORMAL] while on prefire mode. Some modes have a [GREEN]!help[NORMAL] chat command for a list of commands.

Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch server mode. [GREEN]!mode prac[NORMAL] works as well. Type [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] for the current mode map list. [GREEN]!map de_inferno[NORMAL] works as well.  To enter [GREEN]prefire practice[NORMAL] mode, please type [RED]!prefire[NORMAL] while on prefire mode. Some modes have a [GREEN]!help[NORMAL] chat command for a list of commands.

OnPlayerConnectMsgs.msg: [GREEN]Server Mode[NORMAL]: [RED]Multi 1v1 Arenas  [NORMAL]Type [GREEN]!modes[NORMAL] to switch mode, [GREEN]!maps[NORMAL] to switch map.  You can also type [GREEN]!rtv[NORMAL] to rock a map vote.  Map will change at the end of the round.
